original_text: Abraham's servant watched the girl, but he did not say anything. He wanted to know if the Lord had helped him to find a wife for Isaac.
korean_text: 그 사람이 그를 묵묵히 주목하며 여호와께서 과연 평탄한 길을 주신 여부를 알고자 하더니

sentences.original_text: but he did not say anything
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 아무 말도 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: if the Lord had helped him
to find a wife for Isaac
